quotes.quote: If you call a thing bad you do little, if you call a thing good you do much.
Positive thinking is the key to success in business, education, pro football, anything that you can mention. I go out there thinking that I'm going to complete every pass.
Believe that life is worth living and your belief will help create the fact.
Follow your heart, listen to your inner voice, stop caring about what others think.
If you have an open, loving, positive attitude, anything burdensome in life can be lightened!
The only place where your dream becomes impossible is in your own thinking.
Happiness is an attitude. We either make ourselves miserable, or happy and strong. The amount of work is the same.
The next time you feel slightly uncomfortable with the pressure in your life, remember no pressure, no diamonds. Pressure is a part of success.
If you can dream it, then you can achieve it. You will get all you want in life if you help enough other people get what they want.
When life brings you full circle, pay attention. There's a lesson there.
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Take responsibility of your own happiness, never put it in other people's hands.
The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potentialâ€¦ these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
Learning is a gift. Even when pain is your teacher.
Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
A positive attitude may not solve every problem but it makes solving any problem a more pleasant experience.
Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
If you can change your mind, you can change your life.
We are all here for some special reason. Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
Happiness depends more on the inward disposition of mind than on outward circumstances.
Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
Nobody can go back and start a new beginning, but anyone can start today and make a new ending.
To be happy is to think positively, confidently and optimistically.
Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
Life is a gift, and it offers us the privilege, opportunity, and responsibility to give something back by becoming more.
Good things come with positive thoughts, values, judgments and choices!
The positive thinker sees the invisible, feels the intangible, and achieves the impossible.
Positive thinking can be contagious. Being surrounded by winners helps you develop into a winner.
When the world pushes you to your knees, you're in the perfect position to pray.
